results.title: Dog cross stitch pattern quote, "Live love bark", paw prints, fun gift for dog lover, instant download PDF
results.description:
A fun and easy cross stitch pattern showing how to live a dog's life! Fits an eight inch hoop as shown in the image.

• Stitch count: 78 wide x 78 high
• Approximate size on 14 count aida: 5.6in wide x 5.6in high (14.2cm wide x 14.2cm high)
• 4 colours, DMC numbers given 
• Uses full cross stitches; no backstitch or fractional stitches
• Stitch on fabric of your colour choice (image is shown on white fabric)
• Suitable for all skill levels including beginner

You will receive three PDF instant download files:
• Single page chart in colour symbols, with a DMC thread key and a colour picture of the finished pattern
• Single page chart in black and white symbols, with a DMC thread key and a colour picture of the finished pattern
• Beginner's guide to cross stitching, explaining everything you need to know to stitch the pattern

For my other dog cross stitch patterns, please click here: https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/ClimbingGoatDesigns?ref=simple-shop-header-name&listing_id=729684379&search_query=dog

Or for my other cross stitch quote patterns, please click here: https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/ClimbingGoatDesigns?ref=hdr_shop_menu&search_query=quote

This listing is for PDFs of this pattern; it is not a completed piece nor a kit, so no fabric, thread or other materials are included. The charts are Instant Download so you can start stitching straight away! 

A link to the downloads will be sent by Etsy to the email address you gave them. The PDF files will also be available in your Etsy account (unless you purchased as a guest) – look under ‘You’ and then ‘Purchases and Reviews’, and click ‘Download Files’ to the right of your order. You may need Adobe Reader to open the PDF files. If you don’t have it you can download it for free here: https://get.adobe.com/uk/reader/ 

If you have any problems or need help please let me know!

Patterns are for personal use only. 
© Climbing Goat Designs

LAUGH
every day
love beyond words"

results.title: Men's Live Laugh Love Halloween Shirt   - Spooky Blood Splatter Halloween T-Shirt - Alternative Clothing Graphic Tee - Pastel Goth Tee
results.description:
A dark twist on a classic phrase, whether a spooky top on Halloween or just for someone with a dark sense of humour!

Each T-Shirt design is made by me, and especially created for print. Each shirt is professionally printed using a direct-to-garment method giving a crisp image that won't fade. 

I've spent a long time testing the durability and quality of multiple options, to create products that look great, are Earth Friendly, are durable, and feel good. I'm very proud of these Tees and I hope that you love them!

---------------------------------------------

👕 T-SHIRT SPECS

Single jersey, set-in sleeves. 1x1 rib at neck collar, inside back neck tape in self-fabric. Sleeve & bottom hems use a wide double-needle topstitch.

Peta Vegan Approved
Eco-Friendly      
100% Organic Pre-Shrunk Ringspun Cotton      
155gsm For Durability and Comfort
Machine Washable
Quality Tested

---------------------------------------------

📏 SIZING

Standard Female Fitted. Several sizes available, please use Size chart in images to get accurate measurements. 

This is a fitted Tee, for a looser fit or for men there is a Unisex version of this Tee in store.

---------------------------------------------

👉 ORDER INFO

I aim to get all T-Shirts dispatched within 1-2 working days, please keep in mind this may be longer during Christmas and busy periods.

---------------------------------------------

🌍 SHIPPING & DELIVERY

Delivery is FREE on all orders, no matter where in the world you are ordering from!

U.K orders                    - First Class 24 Hour Delivery
Europe                          - Standard 3-5 Working Day Delivery
U.S orders                    - USPS Tracked 5-10 Working Day Delivery
Everywhere else          - 5-15 Working Days

---------------------------------------------

🛀 CARE GUIDE
Machine wash cold (max 30C or 90F), inside out, with like colours. Do not iron directly onto the print. Do not bleach. Do not dry clean. Air dry when possible.

---------------------------------------------

Thank you for supporting an independent artist, please check back, I'm always creating something new!
Joel
joel_wade@hotmail.co.uk
TheCosmicOtter.Etsy.Com

results.title: Love is All You Need personlized with names date, makes a great wedding, anniversary, housewarking gift  Couples love this sign
results.description:
This rustic sign is our own unique creation. We like the way the words fit within the O in love. This would make a great wedding gift or anniversary gift. This hand-painted laser engraved sign is made to order just for you. The personalized portion (below LOVE) can say whatever you like, just the last name, first names and last name, second line we put the date on there. We can use month and year or month day and year, your choice. Just let us know in note section when you order.

*We offer several different wedding items in our shop so be sure to check this section, so you get the one that is the perfect fit for you.

We can also change any wording or leave just the way we have created. Personalized gifts make a great way to go, everyone loves the special touch

* This sign measures approximately 12 x 16 inches and is on 3/8 inch blondewood. 

* Creation is shown in Brown/Antique White.

* Several other color options available in drop down selection. The first color will be the color of the text & second color will be the background.

* Shipment is generally 3 to 5 business days.

* If we are shipping directly as gift, we can enclose a small handwritten note card, be sure to let us know what you want the card to say in the NOTES section when you order.

* For PERSONALIZED signs or signs you want modified please put the information in the NOTES section when placing order.

* Hanger attached on backside for easy hanging

* This is hand painted then laser engraved item is made to order.

We have over 700 items in this Etsy shop so be sure to take a look around in the different sections we offer. https://www.etsy.com/shop/ExpressionsNmore?ref=hdr_shop_menu

Also Be sure to check out our 2nd Etsy shop which includes color creations from the use of our LED UV flatbed https://www.etsy.com/shop/SignsForExpressions?ref=hdr_shop_menu

* PROCESS Our handcrafted creations are made using a 7 step process to create a beautiful expression to be cherished for years to come. Two contrasting colors of paint are applied, the design is laser engraved, a fine hairline is applied to the design which gives an awesome touch. The final touches are completed once it goes through our antiquing process with edges distressed.

* COLOR We have a variety of color choices, but if you don't see what you are looking for, please ask  & we will see if we can make it happen for you. Keep in mind when selecting the color options, the first color is the text color, while the second color is the background. See policies for additional questions/clarification on colors.

* Please note these signs are not massed produced but each is unique and no two are exactly the same.

*When working with wood and the antiquing process, each sign has its own warmth and charm. While we try to get the best wood at the lumber yard, sometimes there will be knots or other slight imperfections in the wood, this is considered adding character to the rustic style of this line of our signs. Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask any questions.

Color Samples can be seen in a variety of sizes at  https://www.expressionsnmore.com/color-examples-rustic-laser-engraved/

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Stencils - 3 Reusable Script Stencils - Wall Stencil Set for Making DIY Wall Decor
results.description:
Stencils by I Like That DIY are made out of a reusable 10 mil mylar plastic, which is flexible yet strong enough to be used over and over again on a variety of projects. They're translucent grey in color, so they're easy to position and ensure perfect visibility as you start painting. Our stencils are light, durable and thinner than vinyl, which makes them ideal for an array of DIY home decor projects.

This set includes three individual stencils: 

1 x "Live" 
1 x "Laugh" 
1 x "Love" 

Each stencil measures 14.5 inches in length and 5.85 inches in height. 

Whether you are using these stencils to add some character to a piece of decor, creating signs, or decorating walls, our stencils will ensure you get a clean + crisp result every time. They're perfect for use on wood, paper, textiles, cement, ceramic + more!

Customizing your space with Word Stencils will instantly add some character to your home. Group, layer or color coordinate your stencil artwork for a truly bespoke look.




**STENCILLING TIPS AND TRICKS**

STEP ONE: Position + Place Your Stencil
Once you’ve determined the position of your stencil, you’ll need to attach it to the surface. We recommend using a spray adhesive on your stencil for this part, as it will keep your stencil completely flat and minimize paint bleed. Alternatively, you can use masking tape around the edges, but if your stencil has finer details in the middle, paint might seep under.

STEP TWO: Apply Your Paint
Stencil specific paint brushes will yield the best results because they’ll allow you to create fun textures and control the amount of pigment. You can also use high density foam rollers, sponges, or spray cans.

PRO TIP: Use as little paint as possible. Dap your brush in your paint, then remove any excess paint on a paper towel before applying your brush to your stencil. Next apply an even layer of paint with a light and steady pressure. If you desire a darker color, wait until the first layer dries, and then apply an additional coat. Applying too much paint at once will cause the stencil to bleed. Don’t overload your brush!

Once your stencil is complete, hold on to one corner of the stencil and slowly pull it up and across to the other side. Don’t go too fast.

results.title: White Farmhouse style Pillow Cover, Live, Love, Laugh, great gift for Wedding, Bridal Shower or Housewarming, 12 x 18 White Canvas
results.description:
White Farmhouse style Pillow Cover, Live Every Moment, Laugh Every Day and Love Beyond Words , great gift for Wedding, Bridal Shower or Housewarming, 12 x 18 White Canvas. 

This listing is for a white canvas pillow cover only, no insert.

Our pillow covers are printed with a sublimation process.  The inks are dyed directly into the fabric, leaving a soft handed print.

Covers have a hidden zipped located at the bottom.

Machine wash on cold, gentle cycle, and dry flat. Do not iron.

Design is on one side only, the reverse side is blank.

PILLOW DIMENSIONS
12X18

EASY TO CLEAN
Pre-treat the stains and hand wash cold water. Do not bleach, tumble dry or dry-clean.
